version_description:
5.0 .1 - Minor performance enhancements

5.1 - Thank you for all of your feedback. We are listening. The app is consistently being improved. We’ve updated our livestream to help with the problems some of you were seeing with live TV. We also addressed some of the audio issues you were experiencing.

Things we fixed:
- Audio issues while playing video
- Livestream playback issues in our Watch section
- We addressed some initial loading bugs
- We continue to improve the speed of the app
- Fixed crashes you are experiencing

We’ve added a tv icon in the top bar to allow you to always have access to Live TV.
We addressed a bug that was causing the widget to display an “Unable to load” message.
We also fixed some bugs and issues leading to crashes.

5.1.1
We’ve added a tv icon in the top bar to allow you to always have access to Live TV.
We addressed a bug that was causing the widget to display an “Unable to load” message.
Bug and Crash fixes

5.2
We have heard you and continue to listen. In this release, we added Reader Mode. In your settings, you’ll find a new text view of the day’s top stories. If you prefer a no-frills presentation of the news, then this is for you. The Settings are located underneath the red CNN square. Click the gear and choose reader mode.

Things we fixed:
Fixed app crash while scrolling through headlines
We fixed some issues with our breaking news banner
We addressed minor bugs

We have fixed a few key performance issues in this release. We have also adjusted our audio settings. We no longer utilize the ringer switch to mute videos. This should address multiple concerns raised in the app store and via our feedback form. We look forward to your feedback as we continue to make improvements to our experience.

- Improved app loading times
- Audio issues addressed
- Fixed crashes related to app startup
Some of you experienced a crash after downloading our last update. We have worked hard to bring you this new version which corrects the crash. Thank you for your continued feedback.
Major improvements to News Feed scrolling behavior and other bug fixes.

Performance enhancements and bug fixes
Live TV adjustments to address intermittent pauses

Bug fixes
Article loading improvements

Bug fixes
Live TV login improvements
Video improvements
Bug fixes

We appreciate all of your feedback. Thank you. We have updated our tablet designs to improve ease of scanning, sharing and saving. We also continue to improve our video experience to make it easier for you to watch live TV and news clips.
Thank you for all of your feedback. This update addresses the article refresh issue discovered in our most recent release.
We added the ability to save and share stories from our news feed and continue to work on performance improvements. We also refined our experience for multitasking on iPad.
We added the ability to save and share stories from our news feed and continue to work on performance improvements. We also refined our experience for multitasking on iPad.
We update our app often to bring you the best experience possible. This release includes minor bug fixes and enhancements.
Update to optimize alert handling.
Continuous optimizations for speed and reliability.
New! Native Cardboard and PodCast player support and we corrected jumpiness in some article pages.

- James Earl Jones is back. Enable the “This is CNN” audio at app launch from the settings menu
- Fixes for stability issues on some iPads
- Battery usage improvements
- Bug squashing and under the hood improvements

Fixes for AirPlay support
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Fixes a bug with video playback on story pages.

Updates to our video player for improved functionality
View photo galleries directly in the news feed
Under the hood bug fixes and reporting improvements

Watch live video coverage on the news feed
Bug fix for freezing and scrolling issues on the news feed
Under the hood improvements

Connect and watch videos from the CNN app on your Chromecast devices
Performance improvements for slow loading and freezing issues
Bug fixes and under the hood updates
